author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Not a bad magazine freebie
review:
Opening;

Workman wheelbarrow is the only Lego city magazine promo I have and I think it's quite good .

The Minifigures-

The minifigure is nice but nothing revolutionary I suppose the most interesting part is his dual moulded hard hat headphones . 

The build-

The "build" is an always nice wheelbarrow , 3 dark blueish grey 1×2 masonry bricks , a broom , a jackhammer , a shovel and a pick axe .

In conclusion-

this is a fairly nice magazine build but nothing too important or to get excited over .
